description:
A free, powerful, reliable and flexible plugin that allows you to create PDF files to be downloaded, opened or printed by your user's browser and/or save the PDF to your database. It works in the browser page and in backend workflows, uses no API, no external services and does not increase your app's costs. If used in the backend workflow it uses a little app capacity just like any other backend workflow.
